author: Richard Hine
title: Trump Regrets
text: Because of the promises he’s breakingBecause of the liberties he’s takingBecause of the pledges he now forgetsPeople are having Trump Regrets He promised to Drain the Swamp, they sayThen named a polluter to head the EPAHe told workers he’d give them a better dealBut his Labor Secretary makes unions squeal His Education Secretary hates schools and teachersHis Interior Sec. loves killing creaturesHe put Ben Carson in charge of H.U.D.Then named a racist to be our next A.G. As Paul Ryan moved to kill MedicareTrump hired a few more billionairesAnd Putin’s got oil, so whaddya know?To the State Department: Exxon’s CEO Trump said he’d make the world a safer placeBut he’s already launched a new arms raceHe’s taking credit for things Obama’s doneThese next four years will not be fun He says “Only I Can Fix,” not “Yes We Can”Paul Krugman says America’s becoming a “Stan”And when he raises the ceiling on our national debtYour grandchildren will get the bill for your Trump regret
